Title: Complete Project for How to: Wrap a User Control Inside of a Web Part
Description: This is a C# project that contains all the code from the Microsoft Patterns and Practices article "How to: Wrap a User Control Inside of a Web Part for SharePoint".
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This is a C# project that contains all the code from the Microsoft Patterns and Practices article "How to: Wrap a User Control Inside of a Web Part for SharePoint".


This project is the code for the article at at http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd206945.aspx.
I created this Visual Studio Solution because the article did not provide a code download.
This solution should be a good basis for creating your own custom web parts.
